nodes.text: Grenade droids were a variant of the B1-Series battle droid used by the Trade Federation. Like the B1 battle droids, they were bipedal with two arms and two legs and had black sensors, and featured green markings to identify their model. Grenade droids operating by throwing grenades at their targets. They were used during the Invasion of Naboo in the year 32 BBY. Grenadier droids were stationed throughout the city of Theed and were engaged by the Jedi Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi. During the closing portion of the invasion, more of the droids tried to prevent Kenobi from taking out a quad turbolaser cannon. All units of the Trade Federation Droid Army were shut down after the destruction of the Vuutun Palaa.
The Trade Federation also used a similar model called the droid grenadier, which were used on Naboo and later during the Clone Wars.
Grenade droids appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Obi-Wan.
